txt.en: 'You've arrived at last! Hurry, hurry! You need to drink six more beers before the time expires. Quit your spinning and start drinking!'

'Well done, friend! You still have quite some way to go.\n\n'You've now completed stage five. Only two more to go if you wish to finish the Inn League trial again! If you still have the legs for it, head to The Ivy Bush in Hobbiton and continue your trial.'
Inn League -- Green Dragon Trial
Time expired!
'Hurry to The Green Dragon in Bywater and speak with the Inn League member there. Hurry! Time is a-wasting.'
'Drunk already? You've barely begun!'
The Green Dragon Inn is in Bywater town centre, east of Hobbiton.\n\nHead to The Green Dragon Inn in Bywater and talk to the Inn League member there.
'Good, good...almost half-way done!'
Drink beers (4/6)
Drink six beers within the allotted amount of time.
'Oh dear, you look a bit flushed. Are you feeling ill?'
Drank beers (5/6)
Drink five more beers within the allotted amount of time.
'This is quite disturbing to watch, let me assure you!'
Drink beers (5/6)
Drink four more beers within the allotted amount of time.
'You're almost done! Don't bother breathing, just finish it!'
Drank beers (6/6)
Drink three more beers within the allotted amount of time.
Finish before time runs out!
Drink two more beers within the allotted amount of time.
Drink one more beer within the allotted amount of time.
Full and queasy with drink, you should now speak with the Inn League member in front of you.
Talk to the Inn League Member in The Green Dragon Inn
Drink beers (0/6)
Drank beers (1/6)
Drink beers (1/6)
Drank beers (2/6)
Drink beers (2/6)
Drank beers (3/6)
Drink beers (3/6)
Drank beers (4/6)

As a member of the Inn League you are allowed to periodically test your mettle by once more completing the initiation trial.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
You have begun stage five of the Inn League's initiation.\n
